Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc01.view.gui

Class ClientModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc01.view.gui.ClientModel
public class ClientModel extends Object
Represents the client-side model of the game application.
